title: Nvidia Jetson Community Developer
p: 2018 April -  Porting TensorFlow for Nvidia Jetson. Thanks for Nvidia send a free Nvidia GTX 1080Ti for me.

title: Rocket.Chat Contributor
p: Update and patch Rocket.Chat for Sandstorm. Due to there is no official build since 2017. I started to fix some issues. Like a push notification can't pass Sandstorm's container and auth issues.
